title: Why Oil Price is Moving on Saudi Oil Facility Attack

title: Oil prices up 12% after attack on key Saudi oil facilities

title: Evidence points to Iran weapons used in Saudi strike, says alliance, as oil jumps

title: The spike in oil prices will have to get a lot worse before it wrecks the economy
text: Of the recessions the U.S. has seen dating back to the early 1980s, none has come without an oil spike of at least 90%.

title: Oil soars after attack on Saudi facilities, stocks weaken

title: Rising Middle East Tensions Could Spike Oil Prices This Week

title: Markets React to Saudi Oilfield Attack

title: Oil soars after Saudi facility attacks, weak China data hits shares
text: (Reuters) - Oil surged to four-month highs on Monday after weekend attacks on crude facilities in Saudi Arabia sparked supply fears, while shares in Asia extended losses as bleak economic data from China sapped investors' risk appetite.

title: Oil soars after attack on Saudi facilities, poor China data drags on shares
text: Oil surged to four-month highs on Monday after weekend attacks on crude facilities at key producer Saudi Arabia sparked supply fears, while shares in Asia extended losses as bleak economic data from China sapped investor risk appetite.
